CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 30, 1961, pg. 13 reads: "Christmas Carolers - Residents of Whiteside Road Courts 809-811 thrilled to the voices of the United Singers, last Friday evening, as they caroled on each doorstep and passed out candy canes to children in community. Richard Gaines directed the singing.  Mrs. Lucille Davenport, an adviser, chaperoned the group.  In addition to distributing candy canes and hot chocolate to passersby, the group took cookies to three shut-ins. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Richard Gaines conducting the United Singers choir, caroling for residents of Whiteside Road Courts 809-811, another version
